long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DISCLAIMER: 
WORKS ONLY FOR RATERHUB PLATFORM, and Timed Tasks

This is still a work in progress, continue to utilize traditional methods while testing the extension.

Must Have task timer setting enabled in Raterhub settings.


INSTRUCTIONS: 
1. Install the extension.
2. Pin the Extension,
3. Ensure that Task Timer is enabled in the Raterhub settings.
4. Enable the extension by clicking the toggle button. 
5. Start a new task.


Free for use With NO additional in-app purchase
No personal data and No unnecessary
permissions required.

Private and secure locally on your own browser.

Automated Time and Productivity Tracker designed for Raterhub Platform.


Features:
Simple UI/UX popup window within the browser extension.

Automatically tracks time and max estimated time for individual tasks.

Tracks Total Time worked and provides Decimal Conversion of Time worked.

Provides (WD/AET%) Work day time / Average Estimated time percentage.

Stores all data within local chrome storage.

Export functionality to save logs within a CSV file. 

Automatic cleaning/removal of over data (Over 7 days).

Manual cleaning/ removal of saved data in storage.


CHANGE LOG:
Version 1.1: Updated Average Estimated time to reflect a more accurate reading.
